channel.title: Help with animations on 614 items on 564 revision
channel.description:
Ok so we added a few new whips to the server all from the 614 revision.
How do we make the new whips have the same swinging emote as the abby whip?
Thanks :)

item.title: Help with animations on 614 items on 564 revision
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

βats:

Well you would need to manually add the animations, this is a 564 server? I don’t know of any tutorials or anything for that revision. But there is however a tutorial on a 317 maybe with a little practice you could convert. Here is a link to a tutorial for adding animations by SWAT.

Doesnt help that much…

Does anybody know how to do this?

  • Mikey

Read full topic
item.source: Help with animations on 614 items on 564 revision
